Elyas.model.algorithms

Class Algorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • Elyas.model.algorithms.Algorithm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackToBack

    public abstract class Algorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Elyas Syoufi

    Abstract Algorithm class. defines an outline that an algorithm must use in order to move the sensors. this class provides the basic functionality that an algorithm will need.

      • getNumberOfMoves

        public int getNumberOfMoves()
        Returns:
        number of sensor moves taken so far.

      • addMoveListener

        public void addMoveListener(MoveListener moveListener)
        adds a listener to notify when a sensor move is made.

      • addFinishListener

        public void addFinishListener(FinishListener listener)
        add a listener to notify when the algorithm is completed.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to trigger

      • startAlgorithm

        public void startAlgorithm()
        method to be called when the algorithm is ready to be run. simple convenience method to run the algorithm in a separate thread. notifies any finish listeners when the algorithm is finished executing.
